author: mteira
msg: Replace PF_LOCAL with PF_UNIX, since it seems to be equivalent, and the
former doesn't exist on Solaris (for instance)

author: mteira
msg: Force the construction of a sys::ExceptionHolder to avoid the Sun Compiler
to throw an ambiguity error, since it things that sys::ExceptionHolder and
ClosedException are convertible one to the other.

author: mteira
msg: Add a pair of missing std:: namespaces

author: mteira
msg: Choose implementation based on SUNOS definition
